channel.title: Good king automatically loses vs mastermind with guards in a 1v1
channel.description:
#### What happened? 3 people alive- the good king, the mastermind, the reaper good king and mastermind voted up and executed the reaper when the reaper died, the game automatically ended and the unseen won, even though the king had guards left.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? the game is supposed to continue because the king can guard himself and vote the mastermind up with point the finger the next day.
#### Steps to reproduce: Get the good king and mastermind as the only ones left alive.
#### Comments: Please fix this. It hurts when you automatically lose a game that you're guaranteed to win as good king with guards.

item.dc:creator: EvadableMoxie
item.description:
It seems like the King doesn’t count as an unseen or BD for purposes of determining who wins the game. So it wasn’t 1 BD versus the MM, the game sees 0 BD left, 1 unseen left, unseen wins. I’m fairly sure the reverse is true too, if the King is the last cult/unseen the game just ends. The only time this isn’t true is when a possessor has jumped into the King.

So basically, The King wins with the good or evil team but he isn’t actually on that team.

item.description:
Guards don’t matter in this scenario as they only prevent death, not conversion.

The Mastermind can’t convert or kill the King anyway, so this should be an auto-win for BD.

There are a ton of these auto-win/loss issues that don’t fully make sense. i42 need to get on that. It feels really terrible to new players.
